review: I don't normally do reviews but on this I decided I should.  I have a Roku that I love.  After getting the Fire TV Stick, the Roku doesn't come close.  I love the fire stick! More apps and games.  Easy to navigate and quickly find everything I want. I will probably buy another one for my other TV. Great buy!
author: Janet Bu "Jbu35"

review: I have a great connection to the Internet and a very good router in my house (AC).  This unit has more jumpiness to to the picture than the built-in Netflix app on my Vizio TV and much less smooth than the 4 Apple TVs we have in the house.  It has great specs but it doesn't seem to be quite a good as the other devices I have.  I like the remote being Blue Tooth because it is in the bedroom and I like not having to point it anywhere or use it from under the covers.  I sometimes wish there was a reset on it because it does go hinky at times.  But I can unplug and re plug the power and it seems to reset ok.  If the video was better I think I'd love it.
